content.description: The Skate Park Traverse starts at the window on climbers right. To maintain the integrity of the movement, refrain from utilizing the top cement slope and bottom cement rail. Continue through mind boggling conglomerate rock on thin crimps and technical feet. Quest through the cruxes, find good rests,and enjoy the ride! Route ends when bottom cement rail disappears or when wall becomes head high.
content.location: This route is located on North Washington Ave and East Willis Street. Starting on the corner of both streets, identify the cemented conglomerate rock that forms the skate parks parameter.

content.description: Prescott not only holds some of the best granite boulders in town but it is also home to some impressive buildering. Be cautious though, choose the timing of your ascents wisely for you never know whose watching.
